Name: Spellcasting
Description: Can cast spells from the Cleric spell list.

Name: Divine Domain
Description: Gains domain spells and a domain feature related to their deity.

Name: Divine Sense
Description: Can use an action to detect the presence of celestials, fiends, and undead within 60 feet.

Name: Lay on Hands
Description: Can use an action to heal a creature within 5 feet for a number of hit points equal to their level.

Name: Ability Score Improvement
Description: Can increase one ability score by 2 or two ability scores by 1.

Name: Destroy Undead
Description: Can use an action to turn or destroy undead within 30 feet that have challenge rating of 1/2 or lower.

Name: Divine Intervention
Description: Can call on their deity for aid, which can take various forms depending on the deity.

Name: Potent Spellcasting
Description: Spells that deal damage deal extra damage equal to level.
